definition: to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
Globalnaya Navigatsionaya Satelinaya Sistema or Global Navigation Satellite System (GLONASS), the Russian equivalent of GPS/abbr. to 格洛納斯|格洛纳斯
pinyin: quan2 qiu2 wei4 xing1 dao3 hang2 xi4 tong3

definition: BeiDou Navigation Satellite System (BDS) (similar to GPS)
pinyin: Bei3 Dou3 Wei4 xing1 Dao3 hang2 Xi4 tong3

definition: to launch a satellite/(fig.) (neologism during the Great Leap Forward, c. 1958) to achieve prominent success/(later used sarcastically) to make exaggerated claims/to talk big

pinyin: Pu3 lie4 xie4 ci2 ke4 wei4 xing1 fa1 she4 chang3
containing_words.word: 普列谢茨克卫星发射场

pinyin: wei4 xing1 ding4 wei4 xi4 tong3
wei4 xing1 dao3 hang2 xi4 tong3

sentences.english: Pico-satellites are the import investigative domain in the modern aerospace technologies.
sentences.chinese: 皮型卫星是现代航天技术中的重要研究领域。

sentences.english: We were overjoyed at the news of China haying launched another man-made satellite.
sentences.chinese: 我们听到中国又发射了一颗人造卫星时都很高兴。

sentences.english: The former russian satellite now turn to the west for help.
sentences.chinese: 从前俄国的卫星国现在转向西方要求援助。

sentences.english: The coded signal is received by satellite dish aerials.
sentences.chinese: 编码信号由碟形卫星天线接收。

sentences.english: NASA research satellites or long-duration high-altitude flights might also help.
sentences.chinese: NASA的研究卫星或长期的高空飞行也可以帮上忙。

sentences.english: For example, satellite phones are illegal in some countries.
sentences.chinese: 例如，卫星移动电话在一些国家是违法的。

sentences.english: What's happened to that moon of Saturn?
sentences.chinese: 土星的这颗卫星发生了什么？

sentences.english: Principles and methods are described briefly for measuring earth station antenna gain by using 3dB and 10dB beam widths.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了用卫星源法测量卫星通信地球站天线的特点。

sentences.english: Principles and methods are described briefly for measuring earth station antenna gain by using 3dB and 10dB beam widths.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了用卫星源法测量卫星通信地球站天线的特点。

sentences.english: Lautenbacher said the program might eliminate some sensors from the orbiters.
sentences.chinese: 说，卫星上的感应器可能会删去一部份。

sentences.english: Satellite imagery shows that the forest extent is much less than currently shown on operational maps.
sentences.chinese: 卫星影像表明森林远比实施图上的要少。

sentences.english: Many countries have set up man-made satellites to circle the earth.
sentences.chinese: 许多国家已发射了人造卫星环绕地球。

sentences.english: System testing plays an important part in course of a satellite onboard software test.
sentences.chinese: 系统测试在卫星星载软件的测试中起着重要作用。

sentences.english: Satellite picture of the city of Mannheim.
sentences.chinese: 这是曼海姆市的卫星照片。

sentences.english: SPOT Panchromatic image and results are reported.
sentences.chinese: 卫星全色的图像和结果报告。

sentences.english: The game was relayed by satellite to audiences all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 这场比赛通过卫星向全世界的观众进行了转播。

definition: to shoot (a projectile)/to fire (a rocket)/to launch/to emit (a particle)/to discharge/emanation/emission
